title: Their Cartel Princess
description: The Complete 5-book SeriesI need their protection. They need my heart.Whoever said being a cartel princess would be easy was wrong. Dead wrong. Cora Swan has been betrayed by everyone sheâ€™s trusted. Now powerful enemies want her blood. The only thing standing in their way are her guardians, four men who would die to see her safe. Men who've chosen to follow her, protect her, love her. She owes them her life...But is she ready to trust them with her heart? Their Cartel Princess is a grimly dark and violent story, containing topics some readers might find triggering. This slow burn reverse harem spans five volumes and contains rough, intense sexual scenes.
